hero.label: Frontend Developer & Designer
hero.title:
Clean Code.
Smart Design.
hero.description: I build fast, modern, and minimal websites that focus on usability and visual impact.
projects.title: Projects
projects.allDescription: Complete collection of my web development and design projects
projects.project1.title: AI Portfolio Landing
projects.project1.description: A dark, minimal landing page for showcasing web & design projects. Fully responsive and animated.
projects.project2.title: TechStore – E-commerce Demo
projects.project2.description: A dark, modern eCommerce landing page for showcasing tech products. Fully responsive, minimal, and cleanly structured with smooth UI elements.
projects.project3.title: QuoteFlow – Random Quote Generator
projects.project3.description: A simple and elegant app that displays random inspirational quotes. Features smooth fade-in animations, dark/light theme toggle, and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
projects.project4.title: FocusTimer – Minimal Pomodoro App
projects.project4.description: A simple and elegant Pomodoro timer for focused work sessions. Features smooth animations, circular progress bar, sound alerts, and clean dark UI.
projects.project5.title: WeatherNow – Minimal Weather Widget
projects.project5.description: A clean weather card with animated icons, city name, and temperature display. Features smooth refresh animations and dark theme with neon accents.
projects.project6.title: PaletteCraft – Color Palette Generator
projects.project6.description: Generate beautiful color combinations with one click. Features 5-color palettes, HEX code copying, and smooth color transition animations.
projects.project7.title: Countify – Animated Counter App
projects.project7.description: Beautiful counter with smooth number animations. Features increment/decrement buttons, smooth transitions, and optional sound effects.
projects.project8.title: Tasky – Minimal To-Do List
projects.project8.description: Clean and minimal to-do list with localStorage persistence. Add, delete, and mark tasks as complete with smooth animations.
about.title: About
about.text1: I'm Mykola — a frontend developer and designer focused on creating fast, minimal, and user-friendly web interfaces.
about.text2: I enjoy building from scratch: from idea and design to clean, responsive code. My main tools are HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
about.text3: I aim for clarity, smooth user flow, and efficient structure in every project.
about.skill1.title: Frontend
about.skill2.title: Design
about.skill3.title: Workflow
about.bio1: I'm Mykola — a frontend developer and designer focused on creating fast, minimal, and user-friendly web interfaces. I love transforming ideas into clean, functional websites.
about.bio2: I enjoy building from scratch: from idea and design to clean, responsive code. My main tools are HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Every project is an opportunity to create something meaningful and beautiful.
about.bio3: I aim for clarity, smooth user flow, and efficient structure in every project. Quality and attention to detail are my top priorities.
about.service1.name: Landing Page
about.service1.desc: Responsive single-page website with modern design
about.service2.name: Multi-page Website
about.service2.desc: Complete website with multiple pages and navigation
about.service4.name: UI/UX Design
contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.intro: Ready to collaborate? Reach me through any platform below.

work.title: Statistics & Work Process
work.subtitle: Current status and collaboration details
work.client.title: Client Collaboration Process
work.client.step1.title: Order & Brief
work.client.step1.desc: Client places order and provides detailed project description with requirements and expectations
work.client.step2.title: Mockup Review
work.client.step2.desc: I provide design mockup for review. Client evaluates and suggests changes or approves
work.client.step3.title: Base Version
work.client.step3.desc: Development of working base version. Client reviews functionality and requests adjustments
work.client.step4.title: Final Product
work.client.step4.desc: Complete website ready for launch. Client makes final changes and approves
work.client.step5.title: Payment & Delivery
work.client.step5.desc: Final payment and full project transfer to client with documentation
work.dev.title: Development Process
work.dev.step1.title: Structure Planning
work.dev.step1.desc: Project structure planning and discussion with client about requirements
work.dev.step2.title: Design Creation
work.dev.step2.desc: Creating website mockup with all design elements and user interface
work.dev.step3.title: Base Development
work.dev.step3.desc: Development of base version with HTML structure and CSS styling
work.dev.step4.title: Logic Implementation
work.dev.step4.desc: Adding JavaScript functionality and interactive elements to the project
work.dev.step5.title: Final Adjustments
work.dev.step5.desc: Making final changes, testing, and project optimization
work.statusInfo.title: Status Explanation
work.statusInfo.free: Available and ready to accept new orders. Can start working on your project immediately
work.statusInfo.working: Currently working on a project. May accept new orders with delayed start date
work.statusInfo.waiting: Order received, waiting for client clarifications or feedback to proceed

reviews.comingSoonDesc: Client testimonials and reviews will be available here soon. Currently building my portfolio and gathering feedback from first clients.
